MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA22 postcode area of Ardrossan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm due to faulty electrical equipment outside 8a Millglen Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50pm on Monday, 26 October 2020
